creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: small human figure at center with red shirt and pointed hat riding a horse at center; leafless willow trees at ULC and along bottom half; small building at LLC; low hills in background; small boat (?) URC; inscription across top
marks: Signature, Mark, and Seal ULC: {Aizan sha} (by Aizan)
title: Spring Landscape
